verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H1431>promoted<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> and <S%H5375>advanced<s%> <S%H7760>him,<s%> and set his <S%H3678>seat<s%> above all the princes who were with <S%H8269>him.<s%>

All the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> who were in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H3766>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down,<s%> and paid homage to <S%H2001>Haman;<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> had so <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning <S%H4782>him.<s%> But Mordecai <S%H3766>didn't<s%> bow down or pay him <S%H7812>homage.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who were in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> "Why do you <S%H5674>disobey<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment?<s%>"

Now it came to <S%H559>pass,<s%> when they spoke <S%H3117>daily<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> and he didn't listen to <S%H5046>them,<s%> that they told <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> whether <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>'s <S%H1697>reason<s%> would <S%H5975>stand;<s%> for he had <S%H5046>told<s%> them that he was a <S%H3064>Jew.<s%>
When <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3766>didn't<s%> bow <S%H7812>down,<s%> nor pay him homage, <S%H2001>Haman<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>

But he <S%H959>scorned<s%> the <S%H5869>thought<s%> of <S%H7971>laying<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> on <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H5046>alone,<s%> for they had made known to him <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>'s <S%H5971>people.<s%> Therefore <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were throughout the whole <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> even <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%>'s <S%H5971>people.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5212>Nisan,<s%> in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> they <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H6332>Pur,<s%> that <S%H1486>is,<s%> the lot, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day,<s%> and from <S%H2320>month<s%> to <S%H2320>month,<s%> and chose the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the month <S%H143>Adar.<s%>

<S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> "There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> scattered <S%H6340>abroad<s%> and <S%H6504>dispersed<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and their <S%H1881>laws<s%> are <S%H8138>different<s%> than other <S%H5971>people<s%>'s. They <S%H6213>don't<s%> keep the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1881>laws.<s%> Therefore it is not for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7737>profit<s%> to allow them to <S%H3240>remain.<s%>

If it <S%H2895>pleases<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let it be <S%H3789>written<s%> that they be <S%H6>destroyed;<s%> and I will <S%H8254>pay<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of those who are in <S%H6213>charge<s%> of the <S%H4399>king<s%>'s business, to <S%H935>bring<s%> it into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1595>treasuries.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5493>took<s%> his <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>' <S%H6887>enemy.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> "The <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H5971>you,<s%> the people <S%H6213>also,<s%> to do with them as it <S%H5869>seems<s%> good to <S%H2896>you.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribes<s%> were <S%H7121>called<s%> in on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month;<s%> and all that <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> was written to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H323>satraps,<s%> and to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> who were over every <S%H4082>province,<s%> and to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of every <S%H5971>people,<s%> to every <S%H4082>province<s%> according its <S%H3791>writing,<s%> and to every <S%H5971>people<s%> in their <S%H3956>language.<s%> It was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> and it was <S%H2856>sealed<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring.<s%>

<S%H5612>Letters<s%> were <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H7323>couriers<s%> into all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and to cause to <S%H8045>perish,<s%> all <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> both <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> little <S%H2945>children<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> even on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar,<s%> and to plunder their <S%H7998>possessions.<s%>

A <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>letter,<s%> that the <S%H1881>decree<s%> should be <S%H5414>given<s%> out in every <S%H4082>province,<s%> was <S%H1540>published<s%> to all the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> that they should be <S%H6264>ready<s%> against that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H7323>couriers<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H1765>haste<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment,<s%> and the <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H8354>drink;<s%> but the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> was <S%H943>perplexed.<s%>
